subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Jesper Parnevik shot a career-best nine-under 61 yesterday to take a four-stroke lead after the first round of the Texas Open in San Antonio, overcoming an opening bogey to birdie eight of the next 11 holes. Justin Leonard — the 2000 and 2001 Texas Open winner — and Bob Tway were at 65 along with the 2005 champion Robert Gamez, Mathias Gronberg, Matt Hendrix, Neal Lancaster, Shigeki Maruyama, Daniel Chopra, Richard S. Johnson and Dan Forsman.
